plugin.title: JOSH “SIDESHOW” WILKINSON, UNITED KINGDOM Twitch
plugin.summary: Josh Wilkinson has been analyzing and writing about Overwatch since its release, providing live analysis at events such as TaKeOver 2 and Overwatch Contenders Season 1. He has a passion for strategic complexity and detailed team histories, and the global narratives of the Overwatch scene are his favorite bedtime stories. Follow him on Twitter at @SideshowGaming.
